name: test_NAF_14_4_0_verify_adding_comment_to_post
description:
Test Case: NAF-272
    As a user, I want to interact with post: 'Like' post, leave comments
    Scenario: Verify adding a comment to a post
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to 'Community' tab
    3. Find a post with comments
    4. Click on comment button
    5. Add a new comment
    6. Verify comment is added successfully
    
    Expected Result: User should be able to add comments to posts
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-272
As a user, I want to interact with post: 'Like' post, leave comments
Scenario: Verify adding a comment to a post

Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
2. Go to 'Community' tab
3. Find a post with comments
4. Click on comment button
5. Add a new comment
6. Verify comment is added successfully

Expected Result: User should be able to add comments to posts
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Comment was not added successfully: Test comment 4Sp4howm
assert False
 +  where False = <bound method CommunityPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x7ff976f76920>>('Test comment 4Sp4howm')
 +    where <bound method CommunityPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x7ff976f76920>> = <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x7ff976f76920>.is_comment_present
statusTrace:
self = <test_14_Community.TestCommunityManagement object at 0x7ff976ffa0e0>
setup_and_teardown = <appium.webdriver.webdriver.WebDriver (session="ec6008fc-f8c4-4cf3-9bf1-7516dc2fa8b2")>

    @allure.story("14.4.0 As a user, I want to interact with post: 'Like' post, leave comments")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL)
    @allure.link("https://app.qase.io/case/NAF-272", name="Qase: NAF-272")
    @allure.description("""
    Test Case: NAF-272
    As a user, I want to interact with post: 'Like' post, leave comments
    Scenario: Verify adding a comment to a post
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to 'Community' tab
    3. Find a post with comments
    4. Click on comment button
    5. Add a new comment
    6. Verify comment is added successfully
    
    Expected Result: User should be able to add comments to posts
    """)
    def test_NAF_14_4_0_verify_adding_comment_to_post(self, setup_and_teardown):
        driver = setup_and_teardown
        community_page = CommunityPage(driver)
    
        # 1. Click on comment button
        assert community_page.click_comment_button(), 'No Comment button found on community page'
        sleep(2)  # Wait for comment section to load
    
        # 2. Click write comment button
        assert community_page.click_write_comment(), 'Write a comment button not found'
        sleep(1)
    
        # 3. Generate unique comment text
        comment_text = 'Test comment ' + ''.join(random.choices(string.ascii_letters + string.digits, k=8))
    
        # 4. Input and send comment
        community_page.input_comment_text(comment_text)
        sleep(1)  # Wait for text input
        community_page.send_comment()
        sleep(2)  # Wait for comment to be posted
        community_page.click_feedback_to_app() # submit feedback for the app
    
        # 5. Verify comment is added successfully
>       assert community_page.is_comment_present(comment_text), f'Comment was not added successfully: {comment_text}'
E       AssertionError: Comment was not added successfully: Test comment 4Sp4howm
E       assert False
